text: Stetson University is a private, co-educational university in DeLand, Florida. The university has about 2,200 students. It was founded in 1883. The current president of the university is Christopher F. Roellke. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Hatters. They compete in the Atlantic Sun Conference. ==References== ==Other websites== *Stetson University's Official website *Stetson Hatters' Official athletics website Category:Atlantic Sun Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Florida Category:1883 establishments in the United States Category:1880s establishments in Florida
title: Stetson University
